channel.title: [pi] npc drops[solved close pleas]
channel.description: ok so i think you have to add the item in npcdrop.cfg then add it in npcdrop.tsm like this drop.cfg [code]50 1111 1199 1211 8101 1249[/code] drop.tsm [code]#king black dragon 50:15 555:150 565:150 805:20 830:20 1079:1[/code] the tsm file is for how many of the item the npc drops i think. so how do i change the rareity of the item? like how often it drops?

item.title: [pi] npc drops[solved close pleas]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Format:

#Description NPC:DROP_RARITY [tab] ITEM:AMOUNT [tab] ITEM:AMOUNT CONSTANT:AMOUNT [tab] CONSTANT:AMOUNT
Variables:
#Description - Only used for sorting the code, all lines which start with # are not processed, (like Java comments)
NPC - The NPC’s ID.
DROP_RARITY - The chance of the NPC dropping ANY given item.
ITEM - An item which the NPC should drop.
AMOUNT - The amount of that item.
CONSTANT - A ‘rare’ item to be dropped, (harder than the other 'ITEM’s) NOTE CONSTANTs must be on a new line, or they will be parsed as ITEMs.

Read full topic

item.description:

drop.tsm

the tsm file is for how many of the item the npc drops i think. so how do i change the rareity of the item? like how often it drops?
